thread.title: Operator license for Linh Travel revoked by STB
thread.title_full: Operator license for Linh Travel revoked by STB

author: Singapore, October 2, 2015
title: Operator license for Linh Travel revoked by STB
text: Operator license for Linh Travel revoked by STB Singapore, October 2, 2015 THE Singapore Tourism Board (STB) has revoked the license of Linh Travel with effect from October 1, 2015, in accordance with the Travel Agents Act, for ceasing to carry on the business of a travel manager. According to a statement from STB, Linh Travel was also investigated prior to this for providing STB with false information on its key executive. For the most up-to-date list of licensed travel managers in Singapore, visit STBâ€™s TRUST website .
